channel.title: Pro coders click here[pi]
channel.description: hello guys i need help adding some teleports to the magic tab if anyone out there can help me please reply or add me on aim-needrspshelp we can do this through teamvier BEFORE ANY1 SAYS ANYTHING STUPID IV LOOK AT TUTORIALS AND I NEED REAL HELP

item.title: Pro coders click here[pi]
item.dc:creator: @vrac_defiled vrac defiled
item.description:
@vrac_defiled wrote:

this is really basic coding…

go to \src\server\model\players\packets and open clickingbuttons.java

then go find the case buttons for teleports. (let’s say its case 9190)

search for it, and if there already is a teleport for that tab, it should appear as such:

[code]case 9190:
if (c.teleAction == 1) {
//rock crabs
c.getPA().spellTeleport(3174, 4268, 0);
} else if (c.teleAction == 2) {
//barrows
c.getPA().spellTeleport(3565, 3314, 0);
} else if (c.teleAction == 3) {
//godwars
c.getPA().spellTeleport(2882, 5309, 2);
} else if (c.teleAction == 4) {
//varrock wildy
c.getPA().spellTeleport(3273, 3686, 0);
} else if (c.teleAction == 5) {
c.getPA().spellTeleport(3046,9779,0);
} else if (c.teleAction == 7) {
c.getPA().spellTeleport(2457,5329,0);
}

			if (c.dialogueAction == 10) {
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(2845, 4832, 0);
				c.dialogueAction = -1;
			} else if (c.dialogueAction == 11) {
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(2786, 4839, 0);
				c.dialogueAction = -1;
			} else if (c.dialogueAction == 12) {
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(2398, 4841, 0);
				c.dialogueAction = -1;
			}
			break;[/code]

that is where you change teleport coords

then get case for the teleports, which should be as such:

case 50245: c.getDH().sendOption5("Barrows", "Pest Control", "Tzhaar", "Duel Arena", "BattleGrounds");

that is it I think

Read full topic
